tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I met with an accident a year ago and damaged my front 3 teeth. I literally was looking for a professional and experienced dentist. 
Dr pallavi is very professional and very soft spoken as well. She understood my issues and also made me aware of some others issues which needed to be fixed. After all the fillings we proceeded for crowns. I had to visit 3 times just to give the impression of those teeth but when after so long when i got my crown i can say that i wont regret even 1% visiting 3 times. It fits perfectly well and i must say Dr pallavi‚Äôs experience really helped me here. I am extremely happy and I really wanted to write this review. One last thing, if i ever have to refer someone for any dental treatment, there‚Äôs only one Dentist i am going to refer thats ‚ÄúDr Pallavi‚Äù 
Worth my time and every single rupee spent.
reply_text: Thanks a ton! Your words mean a lot!

review:
I went for  re-root canal treatment of my tooth and cavity fillings at Dentawell. Dr. Pallavi and her staff are very polite and highly skilled to perform any treatment. 

The doctors *** **** ************* *** will explain you case in very much detail. They will keep checking the comfort level of the patient and give proper time to complete the treatment.

I am satisfied with my treatment and would recommend Dentawell clinic for any dental and oral health related consultations.

I am very happy with Dr Pallavi and will definitely recommend her to patients who are looking for dental treatment.
